  • Constructor Details

    • CinemaManager

      public CinemaManager()
      Creates a new CinemaManager. If cineplexList does not exist, create a cineplexList. CineplexList consist of 3 cineplexe stored in an Arraylist.

  • Method Details

    • getCineplexList

      public ArrayList<Cineplex> getCineplexList()
      Gets an ArrayList of Cineplex.
      Returns:
      this CinemaManager's cineplexList.

    • addSessionToCineplex

      public void addSessionToCineplex(Session session, int cineplexIndex)
      Appends a given session to a given cineplex. Displays a message of a successful addition of given session to given cineplex.
      Parameters:
      session - new session to be added
      cineplexIndex - index value of cineplex

    • removeSessionFromCineplex

      public void removeSessionFromCineplex(Session session, int cineplexIndex)
      Method to remove a particular session for a cineplex specified by the staff.
      Parameters:
      session - the session to be removed from the cineplex
      cinexplexIndex - the predefined position of the cineplex from the list of cineplexes

    • removeAllSessionsFromCineplexes

      public void removeAllSessionsFromCineplexes(String movieName)
      Method removes all the sessions that are tied to a particular movie. This method is invoked for example when the Staff removes the movie from the cineplexes entirely.
      Parameters:
      movieName - the movie title tied to the session.

    • getAllSessions

      public LinkedHashMap<String,ArrayList<Session>> getAllSessions()
      Gets the full ArrayList of sessions across all cineplexes.
      Returns:
      all the sessions of all cineplexes.

    • unreserveSeat

      public void unreserveSeat(Seat seat)
      Change given seat's status to empty.
      Parameters:
      seat -

    • reserveSeat

      public void reserveSeat(Seat seat)
      Change given seat's status to occupied.
      Parameters:
      seat -
